meta.title: Eton Academy Home - An Exceptional School for Students Who Learn Differently

meta.content: Providing an exceptional education for students in grades 1-12 who learn differently with dyslexia, dysgraphia, dyscalculia, ADHD, learning challenges, processing disorders, or other learning disabilities or learning differences, in Metro Detroit.
meta.name: description

meta.content: Michigan School for Learning Differences, Birmingham School, Oakland County, Dyslexia School, Learning Differences, Learning Disabilities School, Dyslexia, Dysgraphia, Processing Issues, Auditory Processing, Visual Processing, Learning Disabilities, ADHD, Attention Deficit Disorder, ADD, ADHD School
meta.name: keywords

li.a: Welcome from the Head of School

li.class: mega-menu-item menu-item menu-item-73146 l1-item level-1 has-sub-menu

div.data-caption: A Dynamic Learning Community, Anchoring Students in their Strengths

img.alt: A Dynamic Learning Community, Anchoring Students in their Strengths

figcaption.p: A Dynamic Learning Community, Anchoring Students in their Strengths

li.class: mega-menu-item menu-item menu-item-73148 l1-item level-1 has-sub-menu

li.a: Welcome from the Head of School

div.data-caption: Building Academic Skills and Self-Confidence Since 1986.

img.alt: Building Academic Skills and Self-Confidence Since 1986.

figcaption.p: Building Academic Skills and Self-Confidence Since 1986.

div.div: Founded in 1986, Eton Academy in Birmingham, Mich. is a full-curriculum, independent school for students who learn differently, serving over 220 students in grades 1 through 12.

li.class: mega-menu-item menu-item menu-item-73149 l1-item level-1 has-sub-menu

div.data-caption: Exceptional Academics Delivered How Each Student Learns Best

img.alt: Exceptional Academics Delivered How Each Student Learns Best

figcaption.p: Exceptional Academics Delivered How Each Student Learns Best

div.div: At Eton Academy, we've developed a curriculum as unique and remarkable as our students, called the Eton ApproachÂ®-- a complete system for teaching and learning, and our foundation for student success. We blend neurodevelopmental research-based teaching methods in an environment that is nurturing, warm and kind. We believe learning happens both inside and outside the classroom, and that every moment for our students is a teachable moment.

li.class: mega-menu-item menu-item menu-item-73150 l1-item level-1 has-sub-menu

div.data-caption: A School Community Where Everyone Matters

img.alt: A School Community Where Everyone Matters

figcaption.p: A School Community Where Everyone Matters

div.span: At Eton, we believe school is more than classrooms and lunchrooms, books and lockers. We see school as the foundation for our students to grow into the thinkers, the leaders, and the get-out-and-doers; keeping their lives evolving and our world moving. So, not only do our students get the intensive academic support they need, but have opportunities to explore their passions and interests.

li.class: mega-menu-item menu-item menu-item-73151 l1-item level-1 has-sub-menu

div.data-caption: Your Investment is Essential to Our Success

img.alt: Your Investment is Essential to Our Success

figcaption.p: Your Investment is Essential to Our Success

div.span: Eton Academy is committed to the education of students who learn differently. We build essential skills and confidence that foster lifelong success.
Your investment in Eton will directly impact the lives of our students by providing them with the highly personalized and targeted instruction and resources they need to excel.

li.class: mega-menu-item menu-item menu-item-76052 l1-item level-1 has-sub-menu

div.div: The Hartmann-Eton Center for Teaching and Learning was built to bring the expertise of Eton Academy to the broader community - by empowering teachers outside of Eton with skills and training, more students can thrive, and by providing a robust array of tutoring options, more students can access success.

div.class: carousel crl-container flexslider carousel-73460 arrows show-arrows-always loop-animation pause-on-hover no-auto-advance show-caption caption-position-bottom caption-location-inside animation-fade
last-col first-col page-col offset2 span20 col

div.div:
Serving students who learn differently since 1986, Eton Academy in Birmingham, Mich. is a trusted resource for children and families. Our experienced staff and smaller environment tailors learning to each studentâs need while building academic success and self-confidence. Serving grades 1-12, we deliver a tailored, comprehensive education with a 10:1 ratio.Â
EnrollmentÂ ApplicationsÂ are accepted throughout the year, or call our Admissions Office at (248) 642-1150 for more information.
